text: The Complete Solution Provider Rev. 17-1 Evertz Conﬁ dential and Protected Under NDA Features & Beneﬁ ts System I/O • 18 x 3G/HD/SD Bidirectional on the ﬂ y conﬁ gurable copper coax ports • Broad standards support: 1080p/59.94,1080p/50,1080i/59.94,1080i/50, 720p/59.94,525i/59.94, 625i/50 • 12 SFP+ ports in hot main/hot backup conﬁ guration with ﬂ exible channel mapping for bandwidth optmization • 6 QSFP28 ports in hot main/hot backup conﬁ guration with ﬂ exible channel mapping for bandwidth optimization System Processing and encapsulation over IP: • Loop back of 10GE to SDI path allow central NOC monitoring of remote SDI output • Video at native resolution • 4 groups of audio • Full VANC carriage • Integrated Cross Connect for regeneration of SDI outputs • Frame sync buffer that can be locked to local genlock or IEEE1588 PTP and used for output phase alignment and auto timing Standard Compliances • Audio carriage as SMPTE ST 302 or SMPTE2022-6 or SMPTE 2110-30 • VANC carriage as SMPTE ST 2038 or SMPTE2022-6 or SMPTE 2110-40 • Video carriage as SMPTE RDD 37 (ASPEN) or SMPTE2022-6 or SMPTE 2110-20 Timing Management • 570IPG-X19 series ptionally accept SMPTE 2059-2 or Master PCR via 10GE network connections with ability of time-stamping all content output over Ethernet (UTC at time of reception) Control and Baseband Processing • Modules support control over 570FC Ethernet or in-band from 10GE or 25GE interface • Modules have on board AVM on all baseband signals • SNMP control from VistaLINK or MAGNUM Uniﬁ ed Control The 570IPG-X19-10GE and 570IPG-X19-25GE are Evertz' next generation low latency, ultra high- density gateways for SDI over 10Gb and 25Gb Ethernet. Both IP Media Gateways can be protocol conversion gateways that include SMPTE ST 2202-6, SMPTE RDD 37 (ASPEN), and SMPTE 2110. With direct conversion of up to 18 SD/HD/3G signals to IP using SMPTE ST 2022-6 or SMPTE RDD 37 (ASPEN) or SMPTE 2110 formatting the 570IPG-X19 series delivers unparalleled processing densities. The 570IPG-X19 series can also provide high density format conversion as the industry transitions to SMPTE 2110. As a format gateway, the 570IPG-X19 can do: • SMPTE 2022-6 <-> SMPTE RDD 37 (ASPEN) • SMPTE RDD 37 <-> SMPTE 2110 The 570IPG-X19 also provides per input AVM monitoring, auto timing, time stamped Ethernet outputs. The 570IPG-X19 series modules incorporates patent pending multipath, multi- ﬂ ow packet merge base network bit error resilience for 100% QoS. 570IPG-X19 can be managed via Integrated HTTP web interface as well as SNMP management via Frame Controller.
